mapper.select: SELECT id , email , password , nickname , cdate , profile , udate , ddate , CASE google WHEN '0' THEN '일반' WHEN '1' THEN '구글' END google , CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '대기' WHEN '1' THEN '인증' WHEN '2' THEN '탈퇴' END viewStatus FROM linker.user

SELECT id , email , password , nickname , cdate , profile , udate , ddate , CASE google WHEN '0' THEN '일반' WHEN '1' THEN '구글' END google , CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '대기' WHEN '1' THEN '인증' WHEN '2' THEN '탈퇴' END viewStatus , SUBSTRING_INDEX(profile, '_', -1) AS profileName FROM linker.user WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id , email , nickname , CASE google WHEN '0' THEN '일반' WHEN '1' THEN '구글' END google , CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '대기' WHEN '1' THEN '인증' WHEN '2' THEN '탈퇴' END viewStatus , udate , cdate , udate , ddate FROM linker.user WHERE id > 0 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT id , email , nickname , CASE google WHEN '0' THEN '일반' WHEN '1' THEN '구글' END google , CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '대기' WHEN '1' THEN '인증' WHEN '2' THEN '탈퇴' END viewStatus , udate , cdate , udate , ddate FROM linker.user WHERE id > 0 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
